info.title: Get SEC Filings Data
info.description: Fetches the latest 10-Q for reading and 10-K financials (Excel) using SEC data. Uses dynamic CIK resolution, alias learning, ticker fallback, and GitHub-synced aliases.

get.description: Returns the most recent 10-Q HTML and 10-K Excel filing links (if available) for the given company. Automatically resolves CIK from company name, alias, or ticker symbol using SEC's JSON database, GitHub alias_map.json, and fallback HTML scraping. GPT should present URLs in markdown.

parameters.name: company_name
parameters.description: Company name, known alias, or ticker symbol (e.g., 'AAPL', 'Apple', 'Meta', 'NVIDIA').

200.description: Returns matched name, resolved CIK, most recent 10-Q filing links, and Excel from the latest 10-K (if found).

Matched Company Name.description: Canonical company name as listed with the SEC.

CIK.description: Central Index Key resolved from input.

10-Q Filing.description: 10-Q HTML report links or string fallback message.

10-K/10-Q Index Page.description: Link to the SEC's index.html folder for this filing.

Full HTML Filing Report.description: Direct link to the HTML version of the 10-Q filing.

Financial Report (Excel).description: Link to downloadable Excel (.xlsx) if included in filing.

oneOf.description: Fallback message if no recent 10-Q was found.

10-K Excel.description: Excel download link from latest 10-K, if available.

404.description: No filings found or unable to resolve CIK for the provided input.
